verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hosanna Hosanna
Hosanna in the highest

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Holy Holy Holy
Lord God of Hosts
Heaven and Earth are full of your glory

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Hosanna Hosanna
Hosanna in the highest

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Blest is He who comes in the name of the Lord

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Hosanna Hosanna
Hosanna in the highest
